name: Pushbullet Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Pushbullet Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Pushbullet API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Pushbullet API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: push

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many pushes

type.name: type
type.natural_language_description: 参数名: Type | 默认值: note | (必填项)

title.name: title
title.natural_language_description: 参数名: Title | 作用: Title of the push | (必填项)

body.name: body
body.natural_language_description: 参数名: Body | 作用: Body of the push | (必填项)

url.name: url
url.natural_language_description: 参数名: URL | 作用: URL of the push | (必填项)

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Binary Field | 提示: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be written | 默认值: data | (必填项)

target.name: target
target.description: Define the medium that will be used to send the push
target.natural_language_description: 参数名: Target | 作用: Define the medium that will be used to send the push | 默认值: default | (必填项)
available_options: Channel Tag (值: channel_tag) - Send the push to all subscribers to your channel that has this tag
Default (值: default) - Broadcast it to all of the user's devices
Device ID (值: device_iden) - Send the push to a specific device
Email (值: email) - Send the push to this email address

value.name: value
value.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
value.natural_language_description: 参数名: Value Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

pushId.name: pushId
pushId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Push ID | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: active (值: None) - Don't return deleted pushes
modified_after (值: None) - Request pushes modified after this timestamp

dismissed.name: dismissed
dismissed.description: Whether to mark a push as having been dismissed by the user, will cause any notifications for the push to be hidden if possible
dismissed.natural_language_description: 参数名: Dismissed | 作用: Whether to mark a push as having been dismissed by the user, will cause any notifications for the push to be hidden if possible | 默认值: False | (必填项)
